formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name, CSD location, CICSPlex Context, depending on Location Type value.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to list from: (to list from a Journal use ListFromJournal, to list from a Reposititory use ListFromRepository instead)

formElement.label: CICS Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The CICS configuration that contains the resource definitions that you want to add to the change package

formElement.label: Resource Name:
formElement.documentation: Resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource name

formElement.label: Resource Group:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource group

formElement.label: Resource Type:
formElement.documentation: Resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource type

formElement.label: Serialized Repository Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Additional command(s) to add: XML serialized list of resource object criteria created using procedure SerializeRepositoryObjectCriteria (optional, the command specified below is appended to this)

formElement.label: Change Package ID:
formElement.documentation: The ID of the change package to add the command(s) to

formElement.label: Container Type:
formElement.documentation: Container type to add the resource definition(s) to: must be 'Change Package' for this procedure (to add to other container types, use other Add... procedures instead)
